author: Khaleda Rahman For Daily Mail Australia
title: Could a love egg improve YOUR sex life? | Daily Mail Online
text: Could a love egg improve YOUR sex life? Radio host gives bizarre trend endorsed by Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop website a try... with hilarious results Hit92.9â€™s Heidi Anderson was given Yoni eggs to try by her sexuality coach The egg-shaped stones are said to strengthen vaginal muscles when inserted Bizarre trend was featured on Gwyneth Paltrow's website Goop But afraid to use them, Heidi let the stones sit in a drawer for 18 months unused At the weekend, she tested one and panicked when she couldn't extract it Published: 01:18 GMT, 2 February 2017 | Updated: 01:18 GMT, 2 February 2017 182 shares
